Posts.Content: very positive, thanks happy holidays to u and yours
Posts.Title: alternative to chemo and radiation therapy

Posts.Content: Yes,  I had a lump in my breast size 2cm you could feel, but mammo did not pick up, my doctor and I knew it was there. Ask for u/s positive thoughts
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?

Posts.Content: Hi Patricfeh, Metaplastic breast cancer does not have hormone receptors encluding HER2  , it is a subtype of breast cancer, So from my information it is the same as tnbc.
Posts.Title: triple negative breast cancer, metaplastic

Posts.Content: does anyone  have this kind of cancer...? What was /is your treatment?
Posts.Title: triple negative breast cancer, metaplastic

Posts.Content: Hi Maryelsa322, Thank you for replying:) Did you have chemo first? I am due to start chemo on monday for 12wks I am in a study at UCI irvine calif. after 4 wks of chemo they do a mri to see if tumor has shrunk, hopefully it will then I will continue for 4 more weeks...Then surgery after a month of no chemo.. It Is wonderful to hear a happy story...not many out there on TNBC. my tumor is grade 3..I am 51 and very active so hopefully, I can weather this storm... Any suggestions? again thanks sharing.... Missy
Posts.Title: triple negative breast cancer, metaplastic
